entry.title: What it is
entry.content:
What it is


Time flows so fast that almost we miss our best period of life unconsciously
![][1]
[1]:http://shaozhuqing.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/ac7fe728071e3e99.jpg

How you prove your existence ever

##


A man with his story and works

To remind

To keep going

To love and to be loved

![][2]
[2]:https://article-fd.zol-img.com.cn/t_s640x2000/g5/M00/04/0A/ChMkJlphjUCIRJh_AADHUDwq-8MAAkNTwNuhE8AAMdo488.jpg
